SEARCH
Package ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller

Class TransactionController

java.lang.Object
ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller.TransactionController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/transactions") public class TransactionController extends Object
REST controller for handling transaction-related API requests. Provides endpoints for creating transactions and retrieving user-specific transactions.

    • createTransaction

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TransactionDto> createTransaction(@RequestBody TransactionDto transactionDto)
      Creates a new transaction based on the provided transaction data.
      Parameters:
      transactionDto - the transaction data to create
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created transaction

    • getUserTransactions

      @GetMapping("/user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto>> getUserTransactions(@AuthenticationPrincipal User user, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      user - the authenticated user
      page - the page number to retrieve, defaults to 0
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the paginated list of transactions
